nml_option.name: config_use_benthosTracers
nml_option.description: if true, the 'benthosGRP' category is enabled for the run

nml_option.name: config_do_restart_benthos
nml_option.description: if true, use restart file

nml_option.name: config_use_benthosTracers_sea_ice_coupling
nml_option.description: if true, couple benthos fields with sea ice

nml_option.name: config_set_benthos_flags
nml_option.description: postive integers set testcases which override remaining flags. If negative, defer to user specified flag options
nml_option.possible_values: integers less than or equal to 11

nml_option.name: config_use_carbonate_saturation
nml_option.description: if true, compute carbonate chemistry

nml_option.name: config_use_secondary_reactions
nml_option.description: if true, compute secondary reaction chemistry

nml_option.name: config_use_depth_dependent_porosity
nml_option.description: if true, sets depth dependence of porosity

nml_option.name: config_use_non_zero_diffusivity
nml_option.description: if false, sets diffusivity to zero

nml_option.name: config_use_sedimentation
nml_option.description: if true, apply sediment fluxes to then benthos

nml_option.name: config_use_positive_sedimentation
nml_option.description: if false, sediments are resuspended from the benthos

nml_option.name: config_use_fast_sedimentation
nml_option.description: if true, incease sedimentation rate for advection testing

nml_option.name: config_use_bgc_sinking_flux
nml_option.description: if true, allow particulate sinking fluxes of bgc tracers to the benthos

nml_option.name: config_use_step_initial_profiles
nml_option.description: if true, initialize benthos tracer vertical profiles as step functions

nml_option.name: config_use_benthic_reactions
nml_option.description: if true, enables reaction terms

nml_option.name: config_use_flux_correction
nml_option.description: if true, track transport flux errors in deep storage for conservation

nml_option.name: config_use_ocean_conc
nml_option.description: if true, use bottom ocean concentrations of solutes in surface boundary condition

nml_option.name: config_use_deep_source
nml_option.description: if true, allow source fluxes below the active benthos layers

nml_option.name: config_use_constant_diffusivity
nml_option.description: if true, diffusivity becomes constant with depth

nml_option.name: config_use_ocean_bottom_state
nml_option.description: if true, use the ocean ecosys model to force the benthos

nml_option.name: config_use_couple_ocean_ecosys
nml_option.description: if true, couple the ocean ecosys and the benthos biogeochemistry

nml_option.name: config_use_benthos_monthly_forcing
nml_option.description: if true, use monthly data file of ocean fluxes and concentrations

nml_option.name: config_use_benthos_monthly_terra_forcing
nml_option.description: if true, use monthly data file of terrigenous fluxes

nml_option.name: config_do_benthos_spinup
nml_option.description: if true, run the benthos only with data forcing

nml_option.name: config_benthosTracers_diagnostic_fields_level1
nml_option.description: if true, make variables in benthosDiagFieldsLevel1 available for output

nml_option.name: config_benthosTracers_diagnostic_fields_level2
nml_option.description: if true, make variables in benthosDiagFieldsLevel2 available for output

nml_option.name: config_benthosTracers_diagnostic_fields_level3
nml_option.description: if true, make variables in benthosDiagFieldsLevel3 available for output

nml_option.name: config_benthosTracers_diagnostic_fields_level4
nml_option.description: if true, make variables in benthosDiagFieldsLevel4 available for output

nml_option.name: config_benthosTracers_diagnostic_fields_level5
nml_option.description: if true, make variables in benthosDiagFieldsLevel5 available for output

package.name: benthosTracersPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to include benthosTracers.
